title: Looking for a few beat / trimmed / lowgrade n300 Mayo Cut Plugs
author: shammus

posts.post_title: Looking for a few beat / trimmed / lowgrade n300 Mayo Cut Plugs
posts.post_content:
Giving some thought to getting involved with this set.  Looking for some cheap, affordable examples to get started with. Anyone have any extras you wouldn't mind parting with?  I still have that e107 Keeler around as trade bait in case someone has a HOFer or a few commons they could move.

Best,
Brian
[url]redmaccie@hotmail.com[/url]

Still hoping for some N300s to turn up.  Any player, particularly commons would help!  I have quite a few nice cards available as well if anyone would like to do some trading...

Thanks much
Brian
[url]redmaccie@hotmail.com[/url]
